snippet: The Giants’ receivers have had spectacular and unexpected success this season. The unit’s coach, Sean Ryan, traces it to his experience recruiting players for Harvard.
abstract: New York Giants receivers coach Sean Ryan says his success in coaxing an unexpectedly spectacular season from his receivers can be traced to the time he spent in the trenches of Ivy League recruiting battles as an assistant for Harvard's football team.
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ receivers have had spectacular and unexpected success this season. The unit’s coach, Sean Ryan, traces it to his experience recruiting players for Harvard.

headline.seo: Giants Receivers Coach Traces Success to Ivy League
headline.main: Secret of a Coach’s Success? Ivy League Recruiting Battles
headline.print_headline: Secret of a Coach’s Success? Ivy League Recruiting Battles
